import useCollapse from 'react-collapsed'; import {createUseStyles} from 'react-jss'; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import { Card, CardImg, CardText, CardBody, CardTitle, /*CardSubtitle,*/ Button } from 'reactstrap'; import copy from '../copy.json'; import haas from "../assets/Haas.png"; import stratysis from "../assets/Stratysis.png"; import trotec from "../assets/Trotec.png"; import miller from "../assets/Miller.png"; import aluminum from "../assets/Aluminum.svg"; import steel from "../assets/Steel.svg" import brass from "../assets/Brass.svg"; import plastic from "../assets/Plastic.svg" function listItems(data){ return(data.map((d) =>
  • {d}
    • )); } const useStyles = createUseStyles({ materialFinishes: { textAlign: 'left' }, card: { height:"100%" }, materialIcon: { height:"1em" //still needs to be raised slightly to line up with heading but it's getting better }, cnc: { "flex-wrap":"wrap" } }); function Manufacturing() { const classes = useStyles(); const { getCollapseProps0, getToggleProps0, isExpanded } = useCollapse(); const { getCollapseProps1, getToggleProps1, isExpanded1 } = useCollapse(); const { getCollapseProps2, getToggleProps2, isExpanded2 } = useCollapse(); const { getCollapseProps3, getToggleProps3, isExpanded3 } = useCollapse(); return (

    What We Do

    {copy.Manufacturing.Statement}

    Services

    {/* doesn't seem to work like flexbox stretch */} Machining {copy.Manufacturing.Services.Machining.Statement} 3D Printing {copy.Manufacturing.Services.Printing.Statement} Laser Cutting {copy.Manufacturing.Services.LaserCutting.Statement} Welding {copy.Manufacturing.Services.Welding.Statement}

    Materials (Machining)

    Maybe put in something saying to contact us for questions regarding titanium and other exotic metals.

    Steel

      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.Machining.Materials.Steel)}

    Aluminum

      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.Machining.Materials.Aluminum)}

    Brass and Bronze

      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.Machining.Materials.BrassBronze)}

    Plastic

      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.Machining.Materials.Plastic)}

    Finishes

    Anodized

      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.Machining.Finishes.Anodized)}

    Other

      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.Machining.Finishes.Other)}

    Materials (3D Printing)

      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.Printing.Materials)}

    Materials (Laser Cutting)

    Maybe put something here about how some materials can be engraved but not cut in the list
      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.LaserCutting.Materials)}

    Materials (Welding)

      {listItems(copy.Manufacturing.Services.Welding.Materials)}
    ); } export default Manufacturing;
